# FluxReve

> AI-powered image generation platform with multiple cutting-edge models

FluxReve is a professional AI image generation service that enables users to create stunning images using state-of-the-art AI models.

## Core Features

- **Text-to-Image**: Generate images from text descriptions
- **Image-to-Image**: Transform existing images with AI
- **Multiple AI Models**: Support for various models including Nano Banana Pro, Z-Image, Flux 2 Pro, and Seedream 4.5
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in English, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), and Japanese

## Available Models

- **Nano Banana Pro**: Fast generation with high quality output
- **Z-Image**: Photorealistic image generation with accurate text rendering, sub-second generation
- **Flux 2 Pro**: Professional-grade image generation model
- **Seedream 4.5**: ByteDance's ultra-high quality image generation with large resolution support

## API Documentation

For detailed API documentation, please visit: /help
